thread.title: Open-E to showcase upcoming JovianDSS features at Boston Solutions Day 2015
thread.title_full: Open-E to showcase upcoming JovianDSS features at Boston Solutions Day 2015

author: prbuzz.com
title: Open-E to showcase upcoming JovianDSS features at Boston Solutions Day 2015
text:
Storage software specialist presents new features of ZFS-based Open-E JovianDSS at the event of Gold Partner Boston in Munich, Germany
Atlanta, Georgia; September 1, 2015: – Open-E , a leading developer of innovative data storage software used for building and managing centralized storage servers will be part of Boston’s Solution & Technology Day, taking place on September 3rd, 2015 in Munich, Germany. The established event will be held at the Convention Center of Arabella Sheraton Hotel.
This year’s event is held alongside the European Supermicro Summer Event and offers latest information on Boston’s server and storage solutions, workstations, digital signage and mini PCs. Visitors can experience the latest generation of hardware in live demonstrations. Additionally, all technology partners will inform about their products in interesting presentations and an extensive exhibition.
As the main topics of the event include hyper convergence, cloud computing, and software-defined storage, Open-E will be presenting its ZFS-based Open-E JovianDSS for easy setup and management of big data storage environments. Participants can learn more about the various options the software offers in combination with Boston’s storage systems, especially the recently certified Igloo 4U-24T-Stor. Furthermore, Open-E’s team will announce new high availability features of the product which will be available shortly.
“We are glad to be part of the Boston Solution & Technology Day again. It is a great opportunity to show visitors the advantages of our software combined with Boston’s benchmarked and certified systems”, states Krzysztof Franek, CEO and president of Open-E. “By presenting features such as tiered RAM and SSD caching, data compression, deduplication and many more, customers can see the benefits of a software-defined storage solution for themselves.”
Visitors can attend the event free of charge by registering on http://www.boston-itsolutions.de/boston-solution-day-2015/ .
The event starts at 9:00 a.m. on September 3rd, 2015 and takes place in rooms Effner I, II and room Höll at the Convention Center of Arabella Sheraton Hotel. The detailed agenda is available on http://www.boston-itsolutions.de/wp-content/uploads/agenda_BSD152.pdf
About Boston Server & Solutions
Boston is an international specialist hardware solutions provider headquartered in the UK with subsidiaries in Germany, India, Australia and the US who work with our partners to provide turn-key systems for various markets and applications. We operate heavily within a number of different industries; this means we are uniquely placed to offer you and your customers the latest in technology for testing real world applications – giving you the leverage over your competition.
About Open-E
Open-E is a well-established developer of IP-based storage management software. Open-E JovianDSS, Open-E DSS V7 are robust, award-winning enterprise storage applications which offer excellent compatibility with industry standards, and are the easiest to use and manage. Additionally, they are some of the most stable solutions on the market and undisputed price performance leaders.
Open-E accounts for over 27,000 installations world-wide and has received numerous industry awards and recognition. Thanks to its reputation, experience and business reliability, Open-E has become the technology partner of choice for industry-leading IT companies such as Citrix, Intel®, LSI, VMware, and Adaptec.
For further information about Open-E, its products and partners, visit http://www.open-e.com/
